price: 63. Aan Hem behoren de sleutels van de hemelen en de aarde. En degenen die niet in de tekenen van Allah geloven zullen zeker tot de verliezers behoren
arabic: لَّهُۥ مَقَالِيدُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡخَٰسِرُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: lahu maqālīdu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wa-alladhīna kafarū biāyāti al-lahi ulāika humu al-khāsirūna
